about_the_game:
About

Fruit Juice Order：You have to play the role of the receptionist and firmly remember what the guests ordered. Only the correct dishes can bring income, and the wrong dishes must be compensated for the guests

Feature

The DLC Increase the difficulty level Hard Lv1 for the game starting from the level 20.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(r) Core (TM)2 CPU -T7200 @ 2.50 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Raedon X1600 / Nvidia GeForce 8600M GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
